features: FULL COMPATIBILITY: Widely compatible with karaoke machines, PA, mixer, speaker that has 1/4” mic input for voice amplifying by plugging the mini receiver into these audio devices.

STAGE SOUND QUALITY: High quality sound transmission, clear voice and without feedback, free from distortion. Transmission range can be up to 100 feet in open areas at line of sight, free from obstacles between microphone and receiver.
LONG WORKING TIME: Plug and play. AA battery powered microphone and large capacity rechargeable battery in the mini receiver allows up to 10 hours working time.

SUPPORTS MULTIPLE SETS WORKING TOGETHER: The UHF technology in this handheld microphone allows you to use maximum 32 sets together without interference with each other when each set is working on a different frequency.
MULTI-USE APPLICATIONS: Perfect choice for karaoke party, DJ, wedding, church, business meetings, classroom activities, outdoor or onstage performances.
OPTIONAL USAGE: You can also use this to record audio with both Andriod and iOS phones or DSLR cameras using appropriate adapters (sold separately).

WHAT YOU GET: One receiver and two handheld microphones (one CHA and one CHB), two mic windscreens, two anti-rolling rings, one large capacity battery for the receiver and 4 AA batteries for the mic, one charging cable.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: UHF Wireless Handheld microphone Perfect for vocal transmission or recording for both beginners or professionals.This Hotec professional UHF dynamic Wireless Microphone System provides clear vocal sound. This wireless microphone system works best with any PA, loud speaker, mixer, amplifier or home theater system that has ¼” mic socket. Perfect choice for karaoke party, DJ, wedding host, church, business meetings, public speaking, classroom activities, outdoor or onstage performances. This H-U26C model is a dual wireless microphone, one portable mini receiver works with two microphones. The UHF technology allows you to use several sets simultaneously. You will get: H-U26C Handheld microphone x 2 / H-U26C Mini wireless receiver x 1 / Microphone foam x 2 / Microphone anti-rolling protection ring x 2 / USB charging cable x 1

Crystal clear vocal sound These professional wireless dynamic handheld microphones offer a great frequency response with a cardiod pickup pattern to isolate the primary sound source and minimize background noise, it offers pristine vocal sound. Plug and Play Plug the mini receiver into the mic socket of any powered speaker, mixer, amplifier for audio output, power on the mini receiver and microphone, it is ready to go. Supports multi sets working togethher This UHF wireless microphone system has 32 frequency points for selection and it allows several units working together without worrying about interference with each other as long as you spend a few minutes to choose a most appropriate frequency before use. Extra large battery capacity Battery powered microphone and receiver gives you utmost freedom to walk in the room without the hassle and restriction of cables holding you back. The microphone is powered by 2XAA batteries and the Receiver is powered by extra large capacity rechargeable battery. TROUBLE SHOOTING In case the microphone(s) and receiver are not connected, pair them again following the steps below: 1. Power off the receiver and power on one microphone. 2. Open the battery compartment and find the frequency change button. Hold and press the power button and the frequency change button until the LCD starts to flash. 3. Power on the receiver, wait for a few seconds and power off the microphone.When you power it on again, it is connected with the receiver. 4. Press the frequency change button to select the most appropriate frequency point.

Hotec Karaoke Machine Hotec Karaoke Machine Wireless Lavalier Microphone Wireless Lavalier Microphone Dual Wireless Lavalier Microphone Vocal Dynamic Microphone Model Number W117 Q68 H-U05 H-U25 H-K25 H-W07 Receiver Power Source Built-in Rechargeble Battery Built-in Rechargeble Battery Built-in Rechargeble Battery Built-in Rechargeble Battery AC Number of Microphones Two Two 1 x Lavalier and headset mic 2x lapel mic & 2x headset mic 2x lapel mic & 2x headset mic Wireless ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Wired with 19 feet cable Connector type Bluetooth,AUX, TF, USB Bluetooth,AUX, TF, USB UHF UHF UHF 1/4" Microphone Power AA battery AA Battery rechargeable battery rechargeable battery rechargeable battery

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these in May 2021 for a Judge Judy theme party for my husband's 50th bday. I set up the living room as a courtroom and these microphones worked well in a small space. We took it to our family reunion at the park last weekend, May 2023 memorial day weekend and this wireless microphone has a long transmission range. You can be 150 feet away from the receiver and have no interruptions. These microphones are stellar and I'm sorry it's taken me 2 years to give this review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sounds great except when plugged in to charge because of low battery.
reviews.reviewText: This helped our summer camp sound system by allowing another option for speakers. Held up through the whole month just fine. The main difficulty in design is with the battery powered receiver. Lasts maybe 2hrs tops. DO NOT use mike while receiver is plugged in to ac charging power. It will add a terrible buzz to the sound quality. This was a bit of a challenge in a hectic camp situation where coordinating charging times was not a convenience to us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great buy!!
reviews.reviewText: These mics are great as backup mics, or karaoke mics. However, you will need to boost the gain on the mixing board to get the same feel as a Shure mic, for instance. The battery life is not great, but that can be solved by simply letting it charge while you use it. Tweak the settings to your preferred sound and I promise you, these are definitely worth the money spent. Great to add to the collection!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Bought this because of the small size of the receiver, and I can plug it in directly to my mixer or powered speaker. It works well, and the sound quality is great! No issues with it so far. The only things I have noticed are, 1) when you press the power button on the microphone, there is a click in the speaker. It's not terrible, but I turn the microphone off between announcements, mostly to save battery power. So, there are clicks that happen. 2) when you power on the microphone, there is a slight delay while it connects to the receiver. It means you just have to remember to wait a bit before talking into the microphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy hook up to Bluetooth. Great quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No trabaja no se escucha nada !!! Doesn’t work at all I tried everything even new batteries

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great Sound, but one mic in my set was bad
reviews.reviewText: Love the sound quality. I use it with my ExoGear large Bluetooth speaker that has a Mic plug in... One of my microphones out of the box isn’t working though and I have tried to email the company and talk with them about replacing the one that’s bad and they never got back with me..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous support from Hotec, the best
reviews.reviewText: I have a deaf brother in law and bought these so we could use dictation mode on an Apple laptop and have text come up on a TV while his FIVE sisters chatter. He has a phone app but they all chatter at the same time and the phone just gives up. This way, we can have two mikes they can pass around. Well, it didn't work. Apple would not recognize the input module. I contacted Hotec response and WHAT A response, excellent, detailed, insightful. Working together, we found out some Apple laptops work, others don't. So, what next. They suggested I buy a $7 Hotec cable and try again. I bought it, no good. Then I plugged in a USB audio dongle into my laptop and used the Hotec cable to reduce from the 1/4" plug on the interface device to the 1/8" dongle input. It worked like MAGIC. You can use both mikes and everything works great. I'm an Electrical Engineer who works with all sorts of complex equipment, but this had me stumped. Thank you Hotec Support!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Not the best with a weak battery
reviews.reviewText: Not happy with my purchase as the microphone charger switch is small and battery dies quickly also in the microphones.
En mi opinión es un buen producto, sin embargo tuve que devolverlo porque en el espacio donde lo ocuparía se producía interferencia y un ruido desagradable.
Solo conectas el transmisor y son súper fáciles de usar, se oyen muy bien
Facilidad de uso, diseño y funcionalidad
